channel.title: Remove "challenge" in rightclick or dueling option
channel.description: [b]once i right-click on a player it shows everything nedded and then challenge. i have allot of bugs in duel arena so how can i remove the challenge selection in the right-clicking or disable dueling???[/b]

item.title: Remove "challenge" in rightclick or dueling option
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

this is a server sided edit, just go into client.java server sided and look for “Challenge”

and there should be all these codes together that form the right click box

Read full topic
item.source: Remove "challenge" in rightclick or dueling option
